name: Andean Machu Picchu & Huayna Picchu
description: Arrive half an hour before the departure of the train. In Machu Picchu and Huayna Picchu you will climb many stairs, use suitable walking shoes, non-slip. Carry a small backpack, a camera, wear a hat, sunscreen, insect repellent and a water bottle. Be Careful when climbing Huayna Picchu, it is hard work up the mountain but worth it. Finishing the Guided tour, you will have free time in Machu Picchu so enjoy the magic moment, open your arms and recharge your energy. You can also visit the thermal baths of Aguas Calientes.
